title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4001.1 - General policy-declaration and administration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4001.1 - General policy-declaration and administration

State Regulations

General policies on racing matters are to be declared
by the commission. The administration thereof shall be in the hands of the
executive director acting through the staff of the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4001.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
